content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;


select * from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set

************************************************************************************************

select JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type') payment_type, 
JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type_desc') payment_type_desc
 from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set


    ************************************************************************************************

select CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type')as SMALLINT) payment_type, 
CAST (JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type_desc') as VARCHAR(16)) payment_type_desc
 from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set




    ************************************************************************************************

select *
 from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsonread)


    ************************************************************************************************

select payment_type,payment_type_desc
 from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsonread)with (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(50)

    );

********************************************************************************************

    select payment_type,payment_type_describtion
 from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsonread)with (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_describtion VARCHAR(50) '$.payment_type_desc'

    );


    ********************************************************************************************

select CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type')as SMALLINT) payment_type, 
CAST (JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') as VARCHAR(16)) payment_type_desc,
CAST (JSON_VALUE(jsonread, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') as VARCHAR(16)) payment_type_describtion
 from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set


    ********************************************************************************************


select * from 
    OPENROWSET(
       BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )    as json_array_result
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsonread) with (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as JSON 
    ) 
    CROSS APPLY openjson(payment_type_desc) with (
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        value NVARCHAR(15)
    ) ;  



        ********************************************************************************************


select payment_type,sub_type,payment_type_describtion_value from 
    OPENROWSET(
       BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jsonread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )    as json_array_result
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsonread) with (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as JSON 
    ) 
    CROSS APPLY openjson(payment_type_desc) with (
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_describtion_value NVARCHAR(15) '$.value'
    ) ;
